name: Too Many Sheep
description:
Too Many Sheep invites players to step into the role of a sheepdog tasked with herding a flock of unruly sheep. With its challenging gameplay and varied difficulty levels, this game will test your strategic thinking and herding skills like never before.

As you navigate various levels, you must use your wits and quick reflexes to keep the mischievous sheep from breaking away and scattering in different directions. With up to four players, you and your friends can work together to manage the chaos or face off against each other in PvP mode.

Featuring 100% unique, hand-crafted 3D models, Too Many Sheep will surely delight players of all ages. But what sets this game apart is that it was created with parents and kids in mind. Whether you're playing co-op or PvP, you'll be screaming with laughter as you work together to herd those sheep and achieve victory.

So why wait? Grab your family and friends and get ready to experience the joy and excitement of Too Many Sheep.

Features being developed:

  • Herd a flock of unruly sheep through various levels
  • Varying difficulty levels to test your herding skills and strategic thinking
  • Up to four players can play together
  • Ten co-op levels
  • Four PvP levels
  • 100% unique, hand-crafted 3D models
  • Created with parents and kids in mind for a fun, family-friendly gaming experience
  • Lots of laughter and excitement
